column4: Well, nobody's answering me on the ppc channel, so I'm going to ask this again here:
I have an iBook G4 running 10.3.9. I just downloaded 8.04 -- the ppc version. How do I install/run it?
i recall if you have 2 macs.. you can make one boot off the others cd drive. if you got them firewirered together. :)
